programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ladd and his father, Chuck, are out feeding cattle on the ranch, sharing stories about the old days and looking forward to a slap-up cowboy spread prepared by Ree Drummond. She's mixing up a fabulous PW steak rub to sprinkle over juicy breakfast steaks.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond and her son, Todd, are delivering dinner to her dad and stepmom, so Ree makes an Italian meal of creamy chicken cacciatore soup, parmesan herb drops biscuits and Italian salad with parmesan crisps.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond cooks food for her kid crew to take home after a busy day of filming. She makes Alex's veggie packed burritos, Mauricio's tortilla soup, Paige's s'mores brownies and Stu's baked BBQ ribs.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: For Father's Day, Molly Yeh is whipping up the creamiest, most-decadent dishes around. She's making saucy chicken alfredo lasagna, toasted ravioli salad with a creamy marinara ranch and, for dessert, chocolate dipped strawberry krumkake cannoli.

programme.title: Valerie's Home Cooking
programme.desc: Valerie Bertinelli is sending a care package to Duff Goldman and his wife, Johnna, to celebrate the arrival of their baby. She makes quinoa, sweet potato and black bean bowls with parsley yogurt dressing and no-bake chocolate peanut butter bars.

programme.title: Trisha's Southern Kitchen
programme.desc: Trisha and Beth take a trip down memory lane as they go through mom and dad's shoebox of recipes. They pull out comforting recipes to cook, such as company chicken, Mama's scalloped potatoes and wild scuppernong pie with cinnamon swirl.

programme.title: Trisha's Southern Kitchen
programme.desc: Trisha Yearwood's daughter, Allie, joins her in the kitchen to learn some tips and tricks as they breathe new life into some favourite childhood dishes.

programme.title: The Kitchen

programme.desc: Guy Fieri challenges his talented chef friends to take a burger beyond the basic patty and bun. Antonia Lofaso combines sirloin and brisket with braised oxtail for an intensely meaty burger and whips orange juice for a crisp Garibaldi cocktail.

programme.desc: Guy tries pork belly tacos and carne adovada in a high-energy marketplace.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The Arctic and Antarctic experience the most extreme seasons on Earth. Time-lapse cameras watch a colony of penguins, while aerial images show a polar bear swimming more than 100 km.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: After filming for three years, the shy Mongolian gazelle and the bizarre-looking Tibetan fox are captured on film. Over six weeks, the team follows a pride of 30 lions as they attempt to hunt elephants.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Jungles cover roughly three per cent of our planet yet contain 50 per cent of the world's species. In the Ngogo forest, the largest chimpanzee group defends its territory from neighbouring groups. Other specialists include a parasitic fungi.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A humpback whale mother and calf embark on a journey from tropical coral paradises to storm-ravaged polar seas. Indonesian coral reefs reveal seahorses, clams and sea kraits. Bull fur seals attack king penguins, and sea urchins fell forests of kelp.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: From the evergreen forests of the frozen north to the deciduous dry forests of the Equator, discover the greatest woodlands on Earth.

programme.title: Meerkat Manor: Rise of the Dynasty
programme.desc: The good fortune of the Whiskers comes to a sudden end when history repeats itself with terrifying consequences for Swift. Meanwhile pregnant Flint leads Hakuna Matata home only to be confronted by local land-grabbers.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: In the ocean, life goes to extraordinary lengths to survive this immense realm. A 30-tonne whale shark gorges on a school of fish. Deep sea octopus fly in the abyss and vampire squid use bioluminescence to create a colour display.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: This stunning series examines critical environmental and conservation issues.

programme.title: Hidden Habitats
programme.desc: In 1985, wolves were released back into Yellowstone National Park. The re-introduction of the predator has set off a cascade of events through the food chain.

programme.title: Hidden Habitats
programme.desc: Steven Backshall investigates what make the Amazon so diverse. He looks at the nutrient poor nature of the rainforest and discusses the strategies used by the life in the jungle to make the most of the little nutrients available.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth
programme.desc: With the Arctic ice sheets falling, and the summer melt beginning July brings dramatic natural shifts.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth
programme.desc: As the Northern Hemisphere turns to autumn, Australia comes back to life and the mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical waters of Tonga.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth
programme.desc: From the millions of Monarch butterflies that collect in Mexico, to the deep fog of Dubai, November brings beautiful signals of winter.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Enchanted Kingdom

programme.title: Olimpia x Internacional
programme.desc: Pela 5ª rodada do grupo B, o Olimpia recebe o Internacional no Defensores del Chaco. No duelo do grupo mais equilibrado - todos têm seis pontos - ambos os times não podem pensar em derrapar. Na ida em Porto Alegre o jogo foi 6 a 1 para o Colorado.

programme.title: Palmeiras x Universitario
programme.desc: Pela 6ª rodada do grupo A, o Palmeiras recebe o Universitario no Allianz Parque. O Verdão busca fechar a primeira fase com a melhor campanha geral, o que lhe garantiria sempre decidir em casa no mata-mata. Los Cremas brigam por vaga na Sul-Americana.

programme.title: Osasuna x Real Sociedad
programme.desc: Pela 38ª rodada, o Osasuna recebe a Real Sociedad no Estádio El Sadar. Sem pretensões no torneio, os Rojillos tentam fechar bem o ciclo na temporada. Já os Txuri-Urdin precisam da vitória para ficar com uma vaga na Liga Europa.

programme.title: Manchester United x Arsenal
programme.desc: Manchester United e Arsenal fazem o grande clássico da 7ª rodada no estádio Old Trafford. O Red Devils não perdem há duas partidas e tentam embalar. Os Gunners vêm de duas derrotas e buscam a recuperação.

programme.title: Nacional x Argentinos Juniors
programme.desc: Pela 6ª rodada, o Nacional recebe o Argentinos Juniors no estádio Gran Parque Central. A equipe uruguaia precisa da vitória para continuar sonhando com as oitavas de final. O time argentino já está classificado como primeiro do grupo F.

programme.title: River Plate x Fluminense
programme.desc: Pela 6ª rodada do grupo D, o River Plate recebe o Fluminense no Monumental de Núñez. Após a histórica vitória na última rodada, o River pode terminar em primeiro do grupo. O Flu precisa vencer para não depender do resultado do outro jogo da chave.

programme.title: Arsenal x Villarreal
programme.desc: No jogo de volta da semifinal, o Arsenal recebe o Villarreal no Emirates Stadium. Os Gunners precisam vencer após derrota por 2 a 1 na ida. Já o Submarino Amarelo chega à sua primeira final europeia se empatar ou perder marcando dois ou mais gols.

programme.title: Real Valladolid x Atlético de Madrid
programme.desc: Pela 38ª rodada, o Real Valladolid recebe o Atlético de Madrid no Estádio José Zorrilla. Os Pucelanos têm que vencer e torcer por outros resultados para não cair. Já o Colchonero só depende de si para ser campeão espanhol pela 11ª vez.

programme.title: Dateline

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: On April 12th 2008, Susan Casey vanishes after a night out. The only clues left behind are suspicious drag marks outside her home. CCTV footage reveals three different suspects on the scene. The police must find out who is lying.

programme.title: See No Evil

programme.desc: When cameras capture footage of a swam of millions of strange creatures invading a church, some wonder if it's evidence of a grisly secret buried in the ground below. Using cutting-edge tech, experts investigate the threat this insect army poses.

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: When a bizarre, alien skeleton is found in an abandoned compound in the Himalayas, some speculate that it's the corpse of a newly-dead dinosaur, and using cutting-edge tech, experts investigate if it's evidence of a top-secret Jurassic Park.

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: When cameras capture footage of a highway swarmed with snake-like creatures and an unexplained ooze, experts investigate the origins of these alien creatures; the latest tech reveals where they came from and their top-secret purpose.

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: When footage of a strange deep-sea vessel is uncovered, experts wonder if its evidence of an autonomous alien craft sent to explore earth, and using cutting-edge tech, investigators follow the clues to an unexpected explanation.

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: In Egypt, a freakish animal is caught on camera, and using cutting-edge tech, experts investigate if this strange beast could explain the secrets of a satanic deity that was once believed to have been worshiped here.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: Deep in the wilderness of the American south, a long-abandoned amusement park is home to secrets of a forgotten, imaginary world. When experts investigate, they reveal why this bizarre place was built and what caused its downfall.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: Places that were once home to Hollywood films and world-famous musicians are now run-down, abandoned, and forbidden; experts investigate their mysteries and reveal the astonishing secrets behind ten of the world's most iconic abandoned places.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: An eerie set of buildings in Paris is evidence of an unspeakable evil. New discoveries reveal the horrific things that happened here, and why they were abandoned.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: A bizarre concrete hideout off the coast of Croatia and a desert island with a contagious past are now forgotten ruins; experts investigate the secrets behind these mysterious island structures to uncover how they were built and why they were abandoned.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: An island of dense jungle is home to an abandoned complex with a dark past of bloodshed and rebellion, and new discoveries at this deserted place reveal why it was built and the gruesome circumstances of its downfall.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: An abandoned castle is the site of hundreds of horrific murders perpetrated by the mysterious countess who once lived there, a woman alleged to be one of the most prolific killers in history; new discoveries reveal what really happened here.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: On a strange island off the coast of Croatia, the mysterious ruins of a long-abandoned hideout look like they once belonged to a James Bond supervillain, and new discoveries reveal why it was built and why they were abandoned.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: An island of dense jungle is home to an abandoned complex with a dark past of bloodshed and rebellion, and new discoveries at this deserted place reveal why it was built and the gruesome circumstances of its downfall.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: A desert island adrift in the Gulf of Mexico contains a massive and marooned structure with a contagious past. Experts investigate and uncover a desolate military fortress turned prison and plagued by a deadly disease.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: The world's most dangerous threats are in top-secret locations all over the planet, and using cutting-edge technology, experts reveal the truth behind these sinister mysteries from space.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: Hundreds of shipwrecks are found in the middle of a desert in Africa. Then, visit a ghost town where hundreds of its inhabitants have mysteriously died. Also, something strange happens in North Korea.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: An abandoned megacity in a remote jungle might be the home of an ancient treasure and a dark secret. When a mysterious circular stone structure is discovered in Scotland, experts investigate whether it's the fabled Round Table of King Arthur.

programme.title: Just Mercy
programme.desc: Civil rights attorney Bryan Stevenson fights for justice and works to free a wrongly convicted prisoner from death row.

programme.title: Talk to Me
programme.desc: The story of radio DJ Ralph Green, an ex-con who became an activist in the 1960s.

programme.title: Basic Instinct
programme.desc: A detective falls for a seductive mystery writer who has written a novel mirroring the recent murder of her rock-star boyfriend. As their relationship progresses, the detective realizes all is not as it initially seems when it comes to his new girlfriend.

programme.title: Queen & Slim
programme.desc: Two people out on their first date go on the run after they are forced to kill a violent police officer who attacks them during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: One by one, sorority girls at Hawthorne College are being hunted and killed by an unknown stalker.

programme.title: The Running Man
programme.desc: A man, participating in a futuristic game show in a dystopian future, must evade a group pursuing agents, each with their own gimmick, and make his way to an underground resistance that fights against a totalitarian U.S. police state.

programme.title: Birthday Girl
programme.desc: A banker purchases a Russian mail-order bride over the Internet, but when the lovely woman arrives, things do not go as planned.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered hit man is hired by an 'organization' that wraps him up in political conspiracy that has Interpol and the military chasing him. Agent 47's life is additionally altered when a woman stirs his conscience and emotions.

programme.title: Showtime
programme.desc: A no-nonsense detective and a bumbling patrolman team up to star in a police reality show.

programme.title: Cats
programme.desc: Based on the musical 'Cats,' this film tells the story of a society of cats in London competing for a chance to be granted a new life at a yearly ceremony.

programme.title: Mama
programme.desc: A man must raise his young nieces after they were abandoned in the forest for five years.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: After her father is murdered, a 14-year-old girl hires the toughest U.S. marshal she can find to help her hunt down her father's killer.

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: An executive wonders why he has been invited to a dinner party where the host celebrates the idiocy of the guests.

programme.title: Cruel Intentions
programme.desc: Two step-siblings hatch a cruel plan to mess up the lives of their innocent schoolmates.

programme.title: Down a Dark Hall
programme.desc: A teenage girl compelled to enrol at the Blackwood Boarding School finds herself assailed by dark forces and the sinister headmistress.

programme.title: The Kitchen
programme.desc: A group of gangsters are locked up and their wives continue the running of their illicit enterprises in 1970s Hell's Kitchen.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: Thieves plan to pull off the heist of their lives by creating the largest traffic jam in the history of Los Angeles.

programme.title: 12 Strong
programme.desc: A U.S. Special Forces team is sent to Afghanistan to secure local allies following the terrorist attacks of 9/11. Led by their new captain, the 12 men struggle with the difficult terrain, a vast cultural divide and a numerically superior enemy.

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: A few years before becoming an internationally known movie star, Bruce Lee is a martial arts instructor in San Francisco. When a visiting monk from China shows disapproval for Lee's teaching of Caucasians, they clash in a legendary fight between masters.

programme.title: Half Nelson
programme.desc: An inner- city junior high- school teacher wrestles with his own addictions and inner demons while forming an unlikely bond with a student who discovers his secret.

programme.title: The Russia House
programme.desc: A publisher must determine the validity of Russian books containing military information.

programme.title: American Son
programme.desc: A broken couple is reunited in a Florida police station in hopes of recovering their missing teenage son.

programme.title: Lady in White
programme.desc: With the help of a ghostly presence, a young man searches for the person who killed 10 children.

programme.title: Cake
programme.desc: A woman becomes fascinated by the suicide of a woman in her chronic pain support group.

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: A family narrowly escape an avalanche during a ski weekend, causing them to re-evaluate their lives.

programme.title: Before Sunrise
programme.desc: A young American falls in love with an intriguing French student on a train to Vienna.

programme.title: Before Sunset
programme.desc: An author and a French woman reunite in Paris after nine years and reassess their lives.

programme.title: Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: While on vacation, a girl discovers love and romance with a local dance instructor.

programme.title: Dirty Dancing: Havana Nights
programme.desc: A virginal American teenager falls for a handsome local boy while vacationing in Cuba with her family on the eve of that country's 1958 revolution.

programme.title: The Wedding Date
programme.desc: When a single executive attends her sister's wedding where the best man is her ex-fiancée, she decides to hire a male escort to pose as her boyfriend.

programme.title: Brown Sugar
programme.desc: A magazine editor and a hip-hop record executive find romance blossoming between them when they find new loves of their own.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: When an overachieving constable is reassigned to a remote town, he discovers that all is not as it seems.

programme.title: More American Graffiti
programme.desc: In a time of crisis and social revolt, friends find themselves in the eye of the storm.

programme.title: Good Boys

programme.title: Their Finest
programme.desc: As the war rages, a woman is hired to be a scriptwriter for morale-boosting films in London. She meets a dashing producer and, as bombs crash down around them, they attempt to make a movie that will warm the nation's hearts when they need it.

programme.title: Doubt

programme.desc: Exploring the limitless potential of innovation though investment opportunities.

programme.title: Managing Asia
